title: AWS DevOps Continuous; Integration, Delivery and Deployment
headline: This free online course is a step-by-step process of integration, delivery and deployment of a software application.
description: AWS is a real-time cloud platform to help you fully manage a continuous delivery service for application and infrastructure updates. We provide you with an understanding of AWS CodePipeline, and what it can do for you and examine all the components and benefits of the platform. We will provide information to assist you in applying an application's integration, delivery and deployment. So, why wait? Enroll today!

courseDescription:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over two hundred fully-featured services from data centers globally. This course provides accurate knowledge of the process of integration, delivery and deployment of an application. It describes and clarifies the characteristics and functions of the tools. It guides you through specific information about the AWS platform, helping you understand 'CodeDeploy' and 'CodePipeline.' We provide answers to questions relating to the Jenkins platform and explore how to correct coding errors. We discuss creating an application and the tools you require, then teach you to assess the various ways of adding and modifying those jobs.

Following this, we will prepare you for the various AWS tools you will need to develop your application. First, learn how to correctly use the tools in AWS and Jenkins to avoid mistakes. Next, you will discover how to troubleshoot the errors to have a functional and successful application. We explain how to set up notifications to monitor your coding. Finally, we clarify what AWS is and what you use Jenkins for before ultimately conveying how to fix errors in the application.

This course will equip you with the skills needed to use AWS to integrate, deliver and deploy an application at a beginner level. It provides precise and detailed techniques you can use in your working field. It is ideal for those starting an application or employees who want to learn how to use it to its full potential. Register for this course and become confident in developing applications.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
